titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Mr. Jeffries asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: This resolution elects Representative Davids to the Agriculture Committee, Representative Peters to the Small Business Committee, and Representative Cherfilus-McCormick to the Transportation and Infrastructure Committee.
